bike.description: Triple-butted 7005 aluminum, 150mm travel mp4 suspension, cartridge bearing pivots, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, asymmetrical chainstays,12x142mm thru-axle, dropper post routing, ISCG05 chainguide mounts, Rock Shox Monarch Plus RC3 High Volume shock with 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger, Rock Shox Maxle rear axle

components.description: Rock Shox Pike RCT3 650B, 3-position compression & lock-out, Charger damper, external rebound, low speed compression adjust, 15mm axle, 35mm stancions, magnesium lowers, 150mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
American Classic All Mountain 650B, Tubeless, 15mm front and 12 x 142mm rear hubs
Geax Goma, 650B x 2.4" front, 650B x 2.25" rear, folding
Avid XO Trail 4-piston with 180mm front and 160mm rear HS1 rotors
Crank Brothers Iodine 2, 720mm x 30mm rise, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep
